articles.title: Study finds that SARS-CoV-2 can infect the arteries of the heart - WSWS
articles.description: The fact that the coronavirus can directly damage the arteries of the heart and induce the formation of so-called “plaques” is a surprise, but not entirely without precedent.
articles.content: A recently published study demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, can infect the coronary arteries that supply blood to the heart. These arteries are the ones involved in a typ… [+5330 chars]

articles.title: Shouting at children linked to depression – but defining what counts as verbal abuse is what will help prevent harmful parenting - The Conversation
articles.description: Shouting at children or calling them names is a kind of emotional abuse.
articles.content:
A recent research paper has found that verbal abuse of children, including shouting at them and calling them names, is linked to low mood, drug abuse and delinquency (antisocial behaviour).
